faqs.question: How do I sign up to Bichard as a new user?
faqs.answer: Contact a user manager in your force who will be able to create your account

faqs.question: What do I do if I don’t receive a sign-in code by email?
faqs.answer: Please check your spam folder and get the user manager in your force to check the email address you are using is correct. If you have done this and still don’t receive emails, please contact Bichard support for help.

faqs.question: How do I change my email address?
faqs.answer: The user manager for your force is able to do this for you.

faqs.question: Why can’t I see reports?
faqs.answer: Please ask the user manager for your force to ensure you are in the ‘Supervisor’ group in Bichard

faqs.question: Why am I getting logged out of Bichard?
faqs.answer: Bichard will automatically log you out after 30 minutes of inactivity. You will need to verify your email again unless you click the “Remember me” checkbox on the login page, in which case you will only need to use your password for the next 24 hours.

faqs.question: Why can I not see the 'Access Bichard' button?
faqs.answer: You do not have any Bichard groups associated with your account. If this is incorrect, please contact a User Manager in your force.
